title: Test different browser locales in Chrome with Desired Capabilities in Katalon Studio
description: Chrome sets a default UI language with the first Chrome window   that opens. In other words, if you alter browser locales, for   example, with command line argument chrome.exe--lang=de  to start Chrome in German, the Chrome driver still   defines the default language from the Chrome browser.

frontMatter.title: Test different browser locales in Chrome with Desired Capabilities in Katalon Studio
